title: The game is unplayable now
body: It's been worse and worse for me with every patch. Fps drops every other game. Now I have 30 at best, and every time I encounter enemy champions it drops even below 10. If this continues in a few more games, I guess the only option for me will be to just quit.

replies.body:
There are still some options left, like troubleshooting this together! FPS issue can be caused by a number of different factors, however, the most common causes are either display driver or windows power setting issues. I strongly advise you to work through our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to address the frequent fixes for this issue.

Let me know if this caused any change.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=mHme2tmg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-07T03:46:01.472+0000)
>
> [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)

None of these helped. What a surprise...

That's unfortunate. :/

We'll need to have a good look at your system logs to further troubleshoot this, so I recommend grabbing our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), run the app to grab some logs, then attach them to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Let me know if you run into any issues submitting your ticket or grabbing logs.
